location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:385 x 413 mm, on sheet 551 x 700 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. Reg. No. 218 E.D.D. 1914 General Staff.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.General map of the Lower Mesopotamia showing communication features including roads, canals and telegraph lines issued to illustrate report compiled by the Army Headquarters entitled 'Plan for operations in Turkish Mesopotamia'.
